title: Look & book: arts & entertainment video directory
creator_credit: Raceplay, Irene Krumins, Gary Gray and Ron Cummings
brief_description: A video catalogue of forty-five groups and artists who are available to perform at all types of venues including school functions and fetes. A wide range of performers are shown, covering such areas as: magic, mime, clowns, rock, country, folk and bush bands, cabaret, comedy, jazz and blues, guitars, piano and chamber orchestas, puppet theatre, dance and movement, vocal peformance and poetry.
